definition: Beitou or Peitou district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
north/(classical) to be defeated

Beitou or Peitou district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: O On weekends and holidays, I often go to one of the Beitou hot-spring resorts with my family.
sentences.chinese: 在週末假日，我常常和家人一同到北投的溫泉勝地。

sentences.english: On weekends and holidays I often go to one of the Beitou hot-spring resorts with my family.
sentences.chinese: 在週末假日，我常常和家人一同到北投的溫泉勝地。

sentences.english: I've heard Peitou has many of those.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說北投有許多這樣的溫泉。

sentences.english: Please arrange for complimentary pick-up service from Beitou Station in advance.
sentences.chinese: 北投站設有定時接駁專車服務，敬請事先預約。

sentences.english: Definitely Beitou hot spring. It's the most famous.
sentences.chinese: 當然是著名的北投溫泉了。
